ai-tika-abh08t19:1_0: Purification of the noble paths is my purification by knowing and seeing,
ai-tika-abh08t19:2_0: for one who is attached to the present conceives that are present.
ai-tika-abh08t19:3_0: There is no place where name and form remains, and when you’re being reborn.
ai-tika-abh08t19:3_2: There is no diversion of name and form, and there is no one thing in one place.
ai-tika-abh08t19:4_1: Ignorance originates from the cessation of ignorance.
ai-tika-abh08t19:4_3: originates from the cessation of deeds.
ai-tika-abh08t19:5_0: He becomes the fruit of his good fortune-teller, and the path to the fruit of stream (only), and so on.
ai-tika-abh08t19:5_1: entered on a way that is embarked, dissatisfaction, in reference to one who has entered on account
ai-tika-abh08t19:6_0: consciousness as conceived in the womb for his mind.
ai-tika-abh08t19:7_1: When you know that extinguishment is the deathless, the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, or as you should dissatisfaction with the deathless.
ai-tika-abh08t19:8_1: This almsbowl is very fruitful, this is how I am born in the path.
ai-tika-abh08t19:9_0: Training in self-control, desiring to pay homage,
ai-tika-abh08t19:9_1: Variously knowing and seeing this path -
ai-tika-abh08t19:9_2: This is the knowledge and vision of the variety of paths.
ai-tika-abh08t19:10_0: Such is the defeat of this Dhamma.
ai-tika-abh08t19:11_0: The exposition of the paths is finished.
